column1: Changes made: Used S3 Glacier to store some of the app data that would rarely be revisited by users; Reduced storage amount by half for web servers; Used Reserved Instances instead of on-demand instances.

* AWS Pricing Calculator provides only an estimate of your AWS fees and doesn't include any taxes that might apply. Your actual fees depend on a variety of factors, including your actual usage of AWS services.
